value.title: Infermedica scores $10M Series A for its ‘AI-driven’ diagnosis and triage platform
value.excerpt: Infermedica, the Poland-founded health tech startup that offers an AI-driven platform for preliminary diagnosis and triage, has raised just over $10 million in Series A funding. The round is led by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) and digital health fund Heal Capital.

value.title: Black Hat: Hackers can remotely hijack enterprise, healthcare Temi robots

value.title: AI named after V For Vendetta masks protects photos from being gathered by facial recognition apps
value.excerpt: A new AI-powered program 'cloaks' images to ward off facial recognition apps. The tool makes subtle pixel-level changes that distort pictures enough so they cannot be used by online scrapers.

value.title: Researchers say we need better benchmarks to build more useful AI assistants
value.excerpt: AI researchers from Element AI, Stanford University, and CIFAR recommend more useful forms of AI that speak with people to get things done.

value.title: Researchers propose AI that delivers personalized health recommendations via smartphone
value.excerpt: Researchers at Harvard, Stanford, and the University of Michigan propose an AI system that delivers personalized health recommendations via mobile.

value.title: Is Facebook Doing Enough To Stop Racial Bias In AI?
value.excerpt: After recently announcing Equity and Inclusion teams to investigate racial bias across their platforms, and undergoing a global advertising boycott over alleged racial discrimination, is Facebook doing enough to tackle racial bias?

value.title: Airtel, AWS join hands to accelerate digital transformation of business in India
value.excerpt: New Delhi: Bharti Airtel (“Airtel”), one of India’s largest integrated telecom providers, today announced a multi-year, Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to deliver a comprehensive set of innovative cloud solutions to large enterprise and small and medium enterprise (SME) customers in India.

value.title: Make AI Enhance Your Productivity—Not A ‘Surveillance State’
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is a powerful tool that can augment employees' experience in the workplace. But, like any tool, it needs to be stewarded properly. Make AI work for you by using it to amplify your productivity.

value.title: Your Amazon Echo speaker just got blocked from using a vital new feature
value.excerpt: AMAZON confirms that it has blocked Echo owners in the UK from using a useful feature that went live late last month. Those who signed up to the Alexa Guard service before it was pulled are now being offered compensation as a gesture of goodwill.

value.title: IDC: AI market revenues continue to grow but at a slower rate
value.excerpt: IDC has said that it expects to see worldwide revenue in the artificial intelligence (AI) market rise this year by around 12.3% compared to 2019. With the increase factored in, the analyst said that the market could see $156.5 billion in revenue this year.

value.title: Federal bill would ban corporate facial recognition without consent
value.excerpt: Senator Jeff Merkley introduced a bill on Tuesday to prevent private corporations from collecting facial recognition data without people’s consent.
